meanings.definition: A type of sugar found in plants.
meanings.sent1: Sucroses are natural sugars present in various fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The sucroses in the apple make it taste sweet and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the sucroses from the garden to satisfy its sweet tooth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as sucroses, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bees buzzed happily around the sucroses in the flower, collecting nectar.

meanings.definition: A sweet substance used as a sweetener in food and drinks.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using sucroses over artificial sweeteners in my coffee.
meanings.sent2: The bakery uses sucroses to make their cakes and pastries taste delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sneak extra sucroses into his lemonade.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweetness of sucroses, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully measured the sucroses to ensure the perfect sweetness in the dessert.
